languages.text: Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.
languages.original_text: Поражает до 4 целей по цепочке в радиусе 3 клеток, нанося каждой цели <u>(уровень посоха псайкера × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} псайкера)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Сhains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>Psyker's staff power level+(psy rating)</u> damage to each.
Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level + psy rating)</u> damage to each.

Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.

Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.

languages.text: Поражает до 4 целей по цепочке в радиусе 3 клеток, нанося каждой цели <u>(уровень посоха псайкера × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} псайкера)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.

traits.locale_text: Поражает до 4 целей по цепочке в радиусе 3 клеток, нанося каждой цели <u>(уровень посоха псайкера + пси-рейтинг)</u> урона.
Поражает до 4 целей по цепочке в радиусе 3 клеток, нанося каждой цели <u>(уровень посоха псайкера + пси-рейтинг)</u> урона.

languages.text: 释放连锁闪电，攻击3格内最多4个目标，对每个目标造成<u>（灵能者法杖力量等级×{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}+灵能者{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.

traits.locale_text: 释放连锁闪电，攻击3格内最多4个目标，对每个目标造成<u>（灵能者法杖力量等级+灵能等级）</u>点伤害。

languages.text: Alcanza a un máximo de 4 objetivos sucesivos en un radio de 3 casillas, infligiendo <u>(nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} del psíquico)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a cada uno.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.

traits.locale_text: Alcanza a un máximo de 4 objetivos sucesivos en un radio de 3 casillas, infligiendo <u>(nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} del psíquico)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a cada uno.

languages.text: Verkettet bis zu 4 Ziele im Radius von 3 Feldern. Dabei wird jedem Feind <u>(Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Psionikers)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.

traits.locale_text: Verkettet bis zu 4 Ziele im Radius von 3 Feldern. Dabei wird jedem Feind <u>(Psioniker-Stab-Energiestufe × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Psionikers)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt.

languages.text: Enchaîne jusqu'à 4 cibles dans un rayon de 3 cases, en leur infligeant chacun <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} du psyker)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.

traits.locale_text: Enchaîne jusqu'à 4 cibles dans un rayon de 3 cases, en leur infligeant <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker + indice psy)</u> points de dégâts.

languages.text: 3セル以内のターゲット最大4体にまで連鎖し、それぞれに<u>(異能者スタッフのパワーレベル + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}+異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.

traits.locale_text: 3セル以内のターゲット最大4体にまで連鎖し、それぞれに<u>(異能者の杖のパワーレベル + 超能力レート)</u>分のダメージを与える。

languages.text: 3 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki en fazla 4 hedefi zincirleme olarak çarparak her birine <u>(ruhsezerin asasının güç seviyesi × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} + ruhsezerin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İRA{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: Chains up to 4 targets within a 3-cell radius, dealing <u>(psyker's staff power level × {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to each.
